name: Wii U Game
summary: Learn about .RPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Cemu is a program that allows you to play Wii U games in Windows. In Cemu you can load an RPX file to play a Wii U game. Select File → Load and navigate to the location of your RPX file. The file is located in the "code" folder of the game directory. An example directory is cemu_1.7.0\​Mario Kart 8\​code.

description: An RPX file is an executable game file run by the Wii U console or Cemu emulator to play games such as Mario Kart 8 or Super Mario Maker. It contains all the files needed to run the game such as the game ROM and texture files. RPX files are large in size due to the amount of files stored within them.
